events.text: Congratulations! You have inherited the family business.
You are a Landlord of a new apartment complex. Great....
There's only one problem: the place is in poor shape already, and if it gets any worse, it may be shutdown by the health department.
In order to have a successful business, you'll need to decide which tenants seem trustworthy enough to rent.
Choosing great tenants will improve the popularity of your apartments, your earnings, and ultimately, its structural integrity.
